title: GM Reports Increased Profits in Third Quarter Amid High Inflation
description: General Motors sold more cars in the third quarter after struggling with a shortage of computer chips earlier in the year.
dc:creator: Neal E. Boudette
category: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
media:credit: Chase Castor for The New York Times
media:description: A Chevrolet is loaded onto a truck for delivery to a dealership in Kansas City, Kan.
